featured.text: Given the harm caused by the burning of medical waste, physicians and nurses have the responsibility to take a lead in reducing the use of plastics in the hospitals.

definition.zh_def: 責任，指對某事的義務或負擔。
definition.en_def: A duty or obligation to deal with something or take care of someone.
definition.example: It is my responsibility to ensure the project is completed on time.
